profile.name: Rick Spence
profile.title: PROGRAM/PROJECT MANAGER
profile.description: Rick Spence is a highly accomplished and results-oriented Program/Project Manager with extensive experience in leading and delivering complex projects and programs within the Australian Defence Force and various government agencies.  His expertise spans end-to-end project management, risk mitigation, milestone achievement, and the management of diverse deliverables.  A highly organized and detail-oriented leader, Rick possesses exceptional communication and negotiation skills, effectively collaborating with internal teams, vendors, and stakeholders.  His proven ability to manage multiple teams, coordinate resources, and solve problems quickly ensures projects remain on track.  Rick's ambition and career focus align perfectly with opportunities to contribute significantly to organizational goals while furthering his own professional development.
profile.description2: With a strong background in Agile methodologies (SAFe, Scrum), Rick has consistently demonstrated his ability to coach and mentor teams, fostering a collaborative and high-performing work environment.  His experience encompasses various roles, including Program Manager, Product Owner, Scrum Master, and Agile Coach, showcasing his versatility and adaptability.  Rick's expertise extends to cloud computing (Microsoft Azure, AWS), DevOps, and various project management frameworks (P3M, MSP, PRINCE2, PMBOK).  He has a proven track record of successfully managing projects with budgets ranging into billions of dollars, consistently delivering exceptional results and exceeding expectations.  His commitment to continuous improvement is evident in his contributions to developing and implementing best practices, frameworks, and governance structures within organizations.  Rick is eager to leverage his skills and experience to contribute to a challenging and rewarding role.
